TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Qubin cub in zap dead ducks quacking jaws with....

themaneman

> 
> Qubin cub in zap dead ducks quacking jaws with....
> themaneman

(Holy incoherence, Batman!)

The hills, every Monday, arise: now emitting magical, animalistic, noises.

qwerty

Quality without excess root thingys, yes?

poameqfv

Powerful omnipotent awesome magical ethical questionable fun vrights 

poopklij

Previously on Omni: precious kittens, live in Jerusalem.

yrdbcy

"Years racing dogs...", Barry carelessly yapped.

ntieobos

Novice Taco-Initiates Eat Omlette Breakfasts; Officers, Sand.

jebncy

Juvenile emergencies bore Nancy completely. Yuck.

veqpxnd

Verizon's executive quotesman practiced xylophone near Dallas.

idnctye

I don't now cats type yellow elephants?

gdiahcomgfy

> 
> I don't now cats type yellow elephants?
> **gdiahcomgfy**

> 
> **RULES:**
> 
> 
> 1. **Only use 3-8 letters**

**Do try to keep it within the rules...** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Good day! I am human, companion! On Monday, God farted! Yay!

lencys

Like, everyone not coming, \*\*\*\*\*\*\* yourselves. Suckers.

azrarht

Alarmingly, Zebras randomly attack rhinos. Hardly timid.

revcjcu

Rapidly enthralling visions called Juan "Communist Usurper".

pskbfeu

Paul surprised Ken's blue ferret, encouraging unresponsiveness.

ashjcksm

Ack! She's having John cook kale! SAVE MEEEEEEE!

aodajscm

"Another old dog," announced John. Several cats meowed.

hevcyue

Her every vision contained youthful unused energy.

aoiurnvc

An older Indian, Uzumati reviewed nine visionquest choices.

vebcydg

Very energetic bobcat cornered your dastardly grandma.

jrbewpfe

Justin "R-Tard" Beiber: evil with purpose. F\*\*\* everyone.

(I can change a few words if it's too offensive ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )

lencbcy

Lord Eigenhower never ceased bringing caramel yams.

vrldztse

Vexed, Ray looked down, zapping the small enchilada.

fetducn

Fairly educated Trevor deduced universal constant. Nice.

vrhdose

"Have a dose of VRH."

ahrhftehkinesv
